amendment.description: To provide protection for nationals and residents of the Islamic Republic of Iran who are targets of persecution.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1630 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1630 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11322) To provide protection for nationals and residents of the Islamic Republic of Iran who are targets of persecution.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1630 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1630 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1542.
